resources.string: Implement periodic notification. Turn on and turn off on button pressing\nhttps://developer.android.com/topic/libraries/architecture/workmanager
Implement network broadcast receiver. Turn on and turn off on button pressing\nhttps://developer.android.com/guide/components/broadcasts

Implement two fragments creation on button with communication between them. Start working with gyroscope on the first one and send information to another one.\nhttps://developer.android.com/guide/topics/sensors
Contacts access is required to display the contacts.
